sets.detail:
A redirecter with TP's to give it as much defense as possible 
 It will click dodge every other turn and in the turns where it doesn't it will use Luster Loot to regain HP 
  Rant to lower R Attackers power, or on a turn you know it will faint 
 Final ruse to also take down one of your opponents 
 Works very well with set up sweepers
sets.author: mvincent05
